vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.31;
son of: Sheshan (H8348); married to Jarha (H3398);
father of: Attai (H6262)
§ Ahlai = "O! would that!"
1) daughter of Sheshan
2) father of one of David's heroes (mighty men, warriors)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá; (b)   padre de Zabad, guerrero, en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞來 这个陽性或陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "啊! 但願!"
1) 示珊的女兒 (代上 2:31|, 請參 #代上 2:34)
2) 大衛戰士之一的父親 (代上 11:41)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚来 这个阳性或阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "啊! 但愿!"
1) 示珊的女儿 (代上 2:31|, 请参 #代上 2:34)
2) 大卫战士之一的父亲 (代上 11:41)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.11.41;
father of: Zabad (H2066I)
§ Ahlai = "O! would that!"
1) daughter of Sheshan
2) father of one of David's heroes (mighty men, warriors)
